channel.title: 法新社
channel.description: 这是一个追踪法新社news的种子

item.title: #切尔西球星萨姆-科尔（Sam Kerr）被指控犯有 "种族严重罪行"：英国警方
item.description:
#BREAKING Chelsea star Sam Kerr charged with 'racially aggravated offence': UK police pic.twitter.com/wo9uoTRNOK

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 4, 2024

item.title: 在多年冲突之后，一场马匹繁育比赛让来自四分五裂的利比亚各地的马术爱好者汇聚一堂，展现了罕见的团结。
item.description:
A horse breeding competition has brought together equestrians from across divided Libya in a rare show of unity after years of conflict.https://t.co/AefHuo1b0Y pic.twitter.com/Nje1ifRHFr

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 4, 2024

item.title: 在哈维尔-米莱伊总统宣布将关闭被他称为前左派政府 "宣传 "喉舌的国家通讯社 Telam 之后，阿根廷政府暂停了 Telam 的运营。
item.description:
Argentina's government suspended the Telam state news agency in the wake of an announcement by President Javier Milei that he would shut down what he called a mouthpiece of "propaganda" for previous leftist administrations.https://t.co/lp6ljW1UWL pic.twitter.com/fa3IzSCKUx

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 4, 2024

item.title: 透视装的潮流主导了巴黎时装周，这表明尽管存在实际甚至法律方面的挑战，但人们对暴露服装的需求依然强劲。
item.description:
The trend for see-through clothes has dominated Paris Fashion Week, showing that demand for revealing outfits is still going strong despite practical and even legal challenges.https://t.co/1NyW7fBcoY pic.twitter.com/WX1pDe4PNG

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 4, 2024

item.title: 加沙的医院饱受打击、围困和袭击之苦，但在日常工作中，巴勒斯坦领土上严重的电力短缺对救生护理工作构成了持久的威胁。
item.description:
Gaza's hospitals have been wracked by strikes, sieges and raids, but on a day-to-day basis, it is the Palestinian territory's acute power shortages that pose an enduring risk to life-saving care.https://t.co/AcsHB5PAmw pic.twitter.com/yXUTUIDQTq

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 4, 2024

item.title: #联合国负责人否认压制有关哈马斯强奸案的报告：发言人
item.description:
#BREAKING UN chief denies silencing report on Hamas rapes: spokesman pic.twitter.com/X7coQkADjg

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 4, 2024

item.title: 在 ChatGPT 面临更多竞争对手之际，生成式人工智能领域的主要企业 Anthropic 宣布推出新模型，为其 Claude 聊天机器人提供支持。
item.description:
Anthropic, a major player in generative artificial intelligence, announced new models to fuel its Claude chatbot as ChatGPT faces more rivals.https://t.co/b6J57Fus9X pic.twitter.com/13UN7oxboZ

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 4, 2024

item.title: #联合国援助巴勒斯坦机构称以色列当局对被拘留的工作人员施以酷刑
item.description:

item.title: 被指控在网上泄露五角大楼绝密文件的美国空军飞行员在联邦法院认罪，根据协议，他接受大约 16 年的监禁，以换取检察官撤销更严重的间谍罪指控。
item.description:
The US airman accused of leaking top secret Pentagon documents online pleaded guilty in federal court under a deal in which he accepted a roughly 16-year imprisonment in return for prosecutors dropping more serious espionage charges.https://t.co/dIzenjx1w2

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 4, 2024

item.title: #有合理理由相信 "哈马斯袭击期间发生了强奸案：联合国报告
item.description:
#BREAKING 'Reasonable grounds to believe' rapes committed during Hamas attacks: UN report pic.twitter.com/IqfHDqAcHs

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 4, 2024

item.title: 厄瓜多尔总检察长办公室称，在对涉嫌贩毒的官员进行的所谓 "清洗 "调查中，包括法官和政客在内的十二人被捕。
item.description:
Twelve people, including judges and politicians, were arrested in Ecuador as part of a so-called "Purge" probe into officials suspected of ties to drug trafficking, the attorney general's office said.https://t.co/1BLwf8xgjW pic.twitter.com/hKsjYJrmYU

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 4, 2024

item.title: 周一，巴黎时装周的倒数第二天，两位最具环保意识的时装设计师展示了他们的秋冬系列。
item.description:
Two of fashion's most environmentally conscious designers presented their autumn-winter collections on Monday, the penultimate day of Paris Fashion Week.https://t.co/cWiuBsYZBJ pic.twitter.com/VwaOXxivXJ

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 4, 2024

item.title: 伊朗官员称，伊朗保守派和极端保守派在议会选举中获得了绝大多数席位，投票率为 41%，为 1979 年伊斯兰革命以来最低。
item.description:
Iran's conservatives and ultra-conservatives secured a large majority in parliamentary elections, officials said, in a vote marked by a turnout of 41 percent, the lowest since the 1979 Islamic Revolution.https://t.co/XvpogBq8kC pic.twitter.com/0phDwBwjwE

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 4, 2024

item.title: 网上流传的帖子中提到的大学和学院告诉法新社，加拿大大学改变了2024年招收香港学生的规定？
item.description:
Universities in Canada changed their 2024 admission rules for students from Hong Kong?

This is false, universities and colleges mentioned in circulating online posts told AFP https://t.co/quVzWSQDgG

— AFP Fact Check 🔎 (@AFPFactCheck) March 1, 2024

item.title: 拜仁慕尼黑主教练托马斯-图赫尔表示，他的球队在周二对阵拉齐奥的欧洲冠军联赛 16 强赛第二回合比赛中不能再耐心等待了，因为他们正试图在主场以 1-0 逆转对手 ➡️ #AFPSports #FCBLAZ #UCL
item.description:
Bayern Munich coach Thomas Tuchel said his side cannot afford to be patient in Tuesday's Champions League last-16 second leg against Lazio as they attempt to overturn a 1-0 deficit at home ➡️ https://t.co/ddrFN5duwC #AFPSports #FCBLAZ #UCL

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 4, 2024

item.title: #美国最高法院一致驳回科罗拉多州要求将特朗普从初选选票中剔除的申请

item.title: 视频：🇬🇧🎻🎷 伦敦寻找巴士艺人以振奋通勤者的精神 "地下音乐 "在英国首都有了全新的含义，因为自科维德大流行以来，地铁交通系统首次举办巴士艺人选拔赛。📹 @akshatakapoor12#AFPVertical
item.description:
VIDEO: 🇬🇧🎻🎷 London searches for buskers to lift commuter spirits

“Underground music” is taking on a whole new meaning in the British capital as the Tube transport system holds busker auditions for the first time since the Covid pandemic.

📹 @akshatakapoor12#AFPVertical pic.twitter.com/IClNmunSCS

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 4, 2024

item.title: 巴黎圣日耳曼为周二客场挑战皇家社会的欧洲冠军联赛 16 强赛第二回合比赛所做的准备工作因主教练路易斯-恩里克对当家球星基利安-姆巴佩的处理而蒙上了阴影 ➡️ #AFPSports #RSOPSG #UCL
item.description:
Paris Saint-Germain's preparations for Tuesday's Champions League last-16 second leg away to Real Sociedad have been overshadowed by coach Luis Enrique's handling of star man Kylian Mbappe ➡️ https://t.co/uwq7hzS2RC #AFPSports #RSOPSG #UCL

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 4, 2024

item.title: 视频：海地政府宣布进入紧急状态并实行夜间宵禁，以便在首都主要监狱发生致命的帮派袭击并导致数千名囚犯越狱后重新控制国家。
item.description:
VIDEO: Haiti's government has declared a state of emergency and nighttime curfew in a bid to regain control of the country after a deadly gang assault on the capital's main prison that allowed thousands of inmates to escape.#AFPVertical
🎥 Luckenson Jean pic.twitter.com/pQK8HVVHAB

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 4, 2024

item.description:
#BREAKING 43 countries demand independent, international probe into Russian opposition leader Navalny's death: statement pic.twitter.com/6iueXR3GOp

item.title: #伊拉克--战争结束多年后，伊拉克人寻求新的沙漠逸乐。

#Iraq - Years removed from war, Iraqis seek new desert escapades.

item.title: 视频：🇺🇸 在《奥本海默》中被忽视的原子弹试验受害者现身说法1945 年 7 月 16 日发生的事件因在奥斯卡最佳影片中的重现而广为人知。但生活在试验场附近的人们说，他们已经被遗忘了。📹 @gclarenne📷 Valerie MACON#AFPVertical
item.description:
VIDEO: 🇺🇸 Ignored in 'Oppenheimer,' atomic test victims speak out

The events of 16 July 1945 are now best known via their re-enactment in the Oscar-tipped movie. But those who lived near the test site say they have been forgotten.

📹 @gclarenne
📷 Valerie MACON#AFPVertical pic.twitter.com/bm30z4iPHo

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 4, 2024

item.title: 欧盟对苹果公司处以 18 亿欧元（19 亿美元）的罚款，原因是苹果公司违反了欧盟法律，阻止音乐流媒体服务向用户告知其应用程序商店以外的订阅选项。
item.description:
The EU has hit Apple with a 1.8 billion-euro-fine ($1.9 billion) for violating the bloc's laws by preventing music streaming services from informing users about subscription options outside of its App Store.https://t.co/zr3COUY5Wh

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 4, 2024

item.title: 周一，中国拉开了本年度最大政治活动的序幕，北京精心编排了一场民族团结的表演，大型花车、嗅探犬和红旗随处可见。
item.description:
China kicked off its largest political event of the year on Monday with large floral displays, sniffer dogs and red flags aplenty as Beijing put on a carefully choreographed display of national unity.https://t.co/rZnGaZ1Dzl

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 4, 2024

item.title: 英国大都会警察局周一表示，奥地利前赛车手格哈德-伯杰（Gerhard Berger）在 1995 年圣马力诺大奖赛后被盗的一辆法拉利跑车已经找回。
item.description:
A Ferrari stolen from Austrian former racing driver Gerhard Berger after the San Marino Grand Prix in 1995 has been recovered, Britain's Metropolitan Police said Monday.https://t.co/Be7BexihTe

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 4, 2024

item.title: 英国保守党政府周三公布了一份选前预算，其中可能会有一些有利于选民的措施，因为首相苏纳克的政党在民意调查中严重落后于主要反对党工党。
item.description:
Britain's Conservative government unveils a pre-election budget Wednesday that could feature voter-friendly measures as Prime Minister Rishi Sunak's party badly trails main opposition Labour in polls.https://t.co/xRknNEUi2p

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 4, 2024

item.title: 韩国表示，将采取措施吊销罢工实习医生的执照，这些医生在医疗培训改革的对峙中违抗命令，要求返回工作岗位。
item.description:
South Korea says it will take steps to suspend the licences of striking trainee doctors who have defied orders to return to work in a standoff over medical training reforms.https://t.co/8GAzJHcJDm

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 4, 2024
